AND CLINAME like CONCAT('%',#{cliname},'%')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CU100010 WHERE SITEID = #{siteid} AND ISDELETE = 0
AND CUSTNAME like CONCAT('%',#{custname},'%')
AND ( CONCAT(MOBILE1,MOBILE2,MOBILE3) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword},'-','') ,'%') OR CONCAT(HOMTEL1,HOMTEL2,HOMTEL3) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword},'-','') ,'%') OR CONCAT(WRKTEL1,WRKTEL2,WRKTEL3) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword},'-','') ,'%') )
AND CONCAT(MOBILE1,MOBILE2,MOBILE3) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword},'-','') ,'%')
AND CONCAT(HOMTEL1,HOMTEL2,HOMTEL3) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword},'-','') ,'%')
AND CONCAT(WRKTEL1,WRKTEL2,WRKTEL3) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword},'-','') ,'%')
AND CUSTNAME like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @RNUM:=@RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM ,A.CUSTNO,A.CUSTNAME,A.CLINO,B.CLINAME ,CASE WHEN REPLACE(CONCAT(A.MOBILE1,A.MOBILE2,A.MOBILE3),' ','') = '' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(A.MOBILE1,'-',A.MOBILE2,'-',A.MOBILE3) END AS MOBILE ,CASE WHEN REPLACE(CONCAT(A.HOMTEL1,A.HOMTEL2,A.HOMTEL3),' ','') = '' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(A.HOMTEL1,'-',A.HOMTEL2,'-',A.HOMTEL3) END AS HOMTEL ,CASE WHEN REPLACE(CONCAT(A.WRKTEL1,A.WRKTEL2,A.WRKTEL3),' ','') = '' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT(A.WRKTEL1,'-',A.WRKTEL2,'-',A.WRKTEL3) END AS WRKTEL ,A.EMAIL ,CONCAT(A.HOMADDR1 ,' ' , A.HOMADDR2 ,' ' , A.HOMADDR3) AS HOMADDR_
FROM CU100010 A LEFT OUTER JOIN sa200010 B ON A.CLINO = B.CLINO ,(SELECT @RNUM := 0) R
WHERE A.SITEID= #{siteid} AND A.ISDELETE = 0
AND A.CUSTNAME like CONCAT('%',#{custname},'%')
AND ( CONCAT(A.MOBILE1,A.MOBILE2,A.MOBILE3) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword},'-','') ,'%') OR CONCAT(A.HOMTEL1,A.HOMTEL2,A.HOMTEL3) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword},'-','') ,'%') OR CONCAT(A.WRKTEL1,A.WRKTEL2,A.WRKTEL3) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword},'-','') ,'%') )
AND CONCAT(A.MOBILE1,A.MOBILE2,A.MOBILE3) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword},'-','') ,'%')
AND CONCAT(A.HOMTEL1,A.HOMTEL2,A.HOMTEL3) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword},'-','') ,'%')
AND CONCAT(A.WRKTEL1,A.WRKTEL2,A.WRKTEL3) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword},'-','') ,'%')
AND A.CUSTNAME like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY A.CUSTNO ) T WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}
SELECT SAVEFILENAME, PATH, ORGFILENAME, FILESIZE, FILEID FROM sys990030 WHERE SITEID = #{siteid} AND FILEID = #{fileid}
